description:
Consider the following examples within a JSP document

<jsp:text>
    <jsp:scriptlet><![CDATA[out.println("HELLO");]]></jsp:scriptlet>
</jsp:text>

 - or -

<jsp:text>
    <jsp:element name="element1">body</jsp:element>
</jsp:text>

In either of the above cases, a translation error is not generated as required
in JSP.5.15.
summary: If jsp:text is provided an invalid body in the context of a JSP document, a translation error is not raised.
